channel.title: Tooldevelopments on Jun-Liszt Li
channel.description: Recent content in Tooldevelopments on Jun-Liszt Li

item.title: SleepyR
item.description: SleepyR is a integrated app for automatic sleep staging analysis of EEG-EMG data.

item.title: MetaBrain Explorer (Spatial Multi-omics Brain Explorer)
item.description: A online interactive website for browsing multi-omics data of mouse brain, which including Brain cell type specific RNA-seq, scRNAseq, scATACseq, brain spatial transcriptome, brain spatial metabolome. Detailed gene information, protein domain, related publications are included.

item.title: SpatialMeta (Online MALDI data analysis server)
item.description: A online interactive website for analyzing MALDI and spatial metabolomics/proteomics data.
